definition: to invite/to provoke/to demand or ask for/to send armed forces to suppress/to denounce or condemn/to marry (a woman)/to discuss or study
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

sentences.english: Who is capable of putting down this armed rebellion?
sentences.chinese: 不知道誰能夠帶領兵將討平這次叛亂？
